column4: i got a major error... and it's happened twice. I've downloaded and burned two diffrent copies of ubuntu descktop 8.04 iso and both copies do the same thing on my rig. I've tried to Live Boot, install Direct from disk and all ways ends in the same thing happing... I'll get a Long wave of error messages just listing on and on for a good solid hour before I get fed up and shut it down... I've taken a snap shot of this and posted it online for
did you checked https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HowToMD5SUM and disc integrity
: and disc integrity  check disc for errors
